title.native: 転生したら第七王子だったので、気ままに魔術を極めます
title.romaji: Tensei Shitara Dai Nana Ouji Dattanode, Kimamani Majutsu wo Kiwamemasu
title.english: I Was Reincarnated as the 7th Prince So I Can Take My Time Perfecting My Magical Ability

description:
The qualities valued most in the study of magic are bloodline, aptitude, and effort. There was one sorcerer who, despite his deep love for magic, was born a commoner and thus lacked the bloodline and aptitude for it. As he died an unnatural death, he wished he had studied magic more while he had the chance. Then, he was reincarnated as Lloyd, the seventh prince of the Kingdom of Saloum and one blessed with a strong magical bloodline. Reborn with all his memories intact, along with the perfect bloodline and immense talent, he was determined to enjoy his new life, using his extraordinary magical abilities to master the study of magic that was beyond his reach in his previous life!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: พอได้เกิดใหม่เป็นองค์ชายลำดับที่เจ็ด ก็เพื่อเรียนเวทย์ให้สนุก

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Femboy
tags.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Incest
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations between characters who are related by blood.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Clone
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an artificial exact copy of another organism.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Chuunibyou
tags.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

name.native: アリーゼ=ディ=サルーム

node.description:
__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).

_Note: Not to be confused with [大野真依](https://anilist.co/staff/309569/)._

Currently affiliated with Tsumugi Akita Anime Lab.

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsg-YqdqQ-KFF0LNk23BY4A) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HiguchiKaede)

Higuchi Kaede (樋口楓) is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber and a member of NIJISANJI's first generation along with Tsukino Mito, Elu, Yuki Chihiro, Shizuka Rin, Shibuya Hajime, Suzuya Aki, and Moira. Within the first generation, she forms the unit "JK gumi" (JK組, high school girl group) along with Tsukino Mito and Shizuka Rin.

[Website](https://kumaka.jp/) | [Profile (Apollo Bay)](https://apollobay.jp/talent/熊田茜音/) | [Profile (Amuse)](https://artist.amuse.co.jp/artist/kumada_akane/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/official_kumaka) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kumadakane_official/)

Akane Kumada is a Japanese voice actress and singer. She is affiliated with Apollo Bay and made her voice acting debut in 2018.
